metadata.name: Starlings in Flight - March 2023
metadata.description:
Starlings' Murmuration in nature is mesmerizing. Enjoy a reproduction using p5.js. Let it run to see the randomness unfold on 225 fully independent little starlings.

Some notes:  
Marketplaces may not display well. To view in Fullscreen:  
https://3gnqm3r4ybcxgagynpjsa3o3ipf7g6gmpeg24wzb25352reatczq.arweave.net/2ZsGbjzARXMA2GvTIG3bQ8vzeMx5Da5bIdd33USAmLM/

The color of the sky will change depending on the hour of the day.

The birds are fully random and every run will be different.

The piece will cycle between the birds flocking together and dispersing, so watch for a while and see their interaction.

Double clicking will flip the state from flocking or dispersing immediately until the next cycle.

A single click can nudge the birds to congregate at the location you clicked. Birds won't always respond to this.

The scripting can require higher processing power, so if the birds seem slow, try a different browser or plug in your laptop.

This piece was built with the assistance of OpenAI's ChatGPT. AI has come a long way in helping people build the code to make imagination into something tangible.

The components are saved in Arweave so they can exist forever.
